name: TalesOfCabra
description:
TalesOfCabra

Its a story game made for Isoco game Jam under 7 days. 

Its a short story game which narrated by a kid of a brave father. The name of the kid is Cabra.

You wanna know about me?

I am the developer of this game I am 16 years old and This is my first game jam.

The story is written and narrated in voice, sorry for grammatical mistakes.

Note 30 percent of the game is completed on the last day of the submission so unfortunately due to the lack of time there are no sound effect in the game.

One more thing, if you played the game it means a lot and your feedback is all I need after this 6 hours of straight work .

Thanks.
